casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

March 16, 2011

[Cite as 03/16/2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-1049.]

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

2010-2238. [State ex rel.] Sassano v. Fuerst.

In Mandamus and Prohibition. On motion for judgment on the pleadings. Motion for judgment on the pleadings granted. Cause dismissed.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur. O’Donnell, J., dissents and would grant an alternative writ.
